traits.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the monk is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

actions.name: Force Strike
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3 damage) force damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

actions.name: Dart
entries: Ranged atk +6 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3 damage) piercing damage.
